artist: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi; Publisher: Enshūya Hikobei; Carver: Katada Chōjirō
creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
dimension: 14 5/8 × 9 7/8 in. (37.15 × 25.08 cm) (image, sheet, each sheet; vertical ōban triptych)
markings: Carver’s seal: 深彫長 {Fuka hori Chō} | Censor seal: 戌八改
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
signed: 一魁斎芳年画 {Ikkaisai Yoshitoshi ga}
text: Related to the play Tokiwa ima yakko ukejō 時皞握虎券, performed at the Nakamura Theatre in the 8th month of 1862.
title: Actors Bandō Hikosaburō V as Oda Harunaga (R), Sawamura Tosshō II as Mori Ranmaru (C), and Kataoka Gadō as Koretō Mitsuhide (L)
